titleStmt.title: God all in all, or, The kingdom of the Son deliver'd up to God, even the Father, by the Son himself being a sermon on the kingdom of God all in all, leading into an exacter and clearer discovery of the kingdom of Christ, upon that great context, I Cor. 15. 24, 28 &c. / by T. Beverley.
titleStmt.author: Beverley, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Will. Marshal and John Marshal,

notesStmt.note: Caption title: A sermon on the kingdom of God all in all.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
